name: [LD48] Pressure
description:
Deeper and deeper into an infinite basement of increasingly difficult enemies, how deep can you go?

Search the maze-like floors for the green zone to drop into the next level and receive half your health back

Chaining combos of kills will also heal you

Enemies will hit harder and increase their spawns as you reach deeper and deeper floors

Watch out for harder enemy types as you go deeper

Controls

W, A, S, and D to move  

Mouse 1 to shoot  

Space to jump  

Heal by entering the next stage (green zone), chaining combo kills or hitting a long range shot

You can interupt an enemy charging up to quickly shoot again by shooting it while it is charging/flashing

Made during Ludum Dare 48 in 48 hours.
